name: Alicemare
description: Alicemare is a somehow familiar yet totally unique adventure game infused with subtle hints of horror, created by △○□× (Miwashiba) using the WOLF RPG Editor.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7 or Greater Processor: Intel Core 2 1.06Ghz Memory: 1 GB RAM Graphics: Integrated graphics Storage: 80 MB available space

reviews.review_text: 3 bucks to have a ♥♥♥♥♥♥ day, worth it tho
